item.title: Supervised Learning
item.description: Definition of Machine Learning quoted from Wikipedia Machine Learing (ML) is a field of study in artificial intelligence concerned with the development and study of statistical algorithms that can effectively generalize and thus perform tasks without explicit instructions. Generally speaking, Machine Learning can be devided into two broad categories and they are Supervised Learning The algorithm is given certain inputs and their corresponding labels and try to learning a general rule that maps inputs to outputs.
